title: The Demon Hunters #1-3
description: It all started with a ring. The search for an heirloom which led Cassidy straight to the gates of a world she never knew existed.  Now, as the gate between the Demon Realm and the Mortal world is no longer secure, war is inevitable. Cassidy is forced to fight the evil forces out to destroy her and the world she calls home, but she can’t do it alone.  There’s Killian, head of the Demon Hunters and Tyler, her friend with his own set of mystical powers. Now she needs to decide who she can trust with her life...and her heart.  Battles are being fought, alliances are broken, and friendships are formed in this epic battle between good and evil.  USA Today bestselling author DA Roach brings you a three-part paranormal adventure filled with twists and turns you won’t see coming. Are you ready?
author: D.A. Roach
